description: '''The Bats''' are an influential [[New Zealand]] [[Rock music|rock]] [[Musical ensemble|band]] formed in 1982 in [[Christchurch]]  by Paul Kean (bass), Malcolm Grant (drums), [[Robert Scott (musician)|Robert Scott]] (lead vocals, rhythm guitar, keyboards) and Kaye Woodward (lead guitar, vocals).  Though primarily a Christchurch band, The Bats have strong links to [[Dunedin]] and are usually grouped in with the [[Dunedin sound]] musicians that emerged in the early 1980s. The band has retained the same four members from 1982 to the present day.
